name: StereoPannerNode
description: The StereoPannerNode interface of the Web Audio API represents a simple stereo panner node that can be used to pan an audio stream left or right. It is an AudioNode audio-processing module that positions an incoming audio stream in a stereo image using a low-cost equal-power panning algorithm.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'StereoPannerNode' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
